alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Martin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:20PM EDT until April 13 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Martin County in southwestern Indiana... Western Lawrence County in south central Indiana... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 620 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shoals, or 22 miles southwest of Bedford, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Lacy around 625 PM EDT. Indian Springs around 635 PM EDT. Huron around 640 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Williams and Silverville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
